hints.label: thm-online-high-dim
hints.title: Online Triangulation in d Dimensions
hints.content:
695: :label: thm-online-high-dim
696: 
697: The online triangulation algorithm generalizes to arbitrary dimension d:
698: 
699: **Per-Walker Update Complexity**:
700: 1. **SDE move (Type 1)**: O(d) Lawson flips on average
701: 2. **Cloning (Type 2)**: O(log N) point location + O(d) flips
702: 
703: **Per-Timestep Complexity**:
704: 
705: $$
706: T(N, d, p_{\text{clone}}) = O(N \cdot d) + O(p_{\text{clone}} \cdot N \cdot \log N)
707: 
708: $$
709: 
710: **For fixed dimension d**:
711: 
712: $$
713: \bar{T}(N, d) = O(N \cdot d) \quad \text{(amortized)}
714: 
715: $$
716: 
717: **Speedup vs. Batch**:
718: 
719: $$
720: \text{Speedup} = \frac{N^{\lceil d/2 \rceil}}{N \cdot d} = \frac{N^{\lceil d/2 \rceil - 1}}{d}
721: 
722: $$
723: 
724: **Example (d=4, N=10⁶)**:
725: - Batch: O(N²) ≈ 10¹² operations
hints.raw_directive:
692: ### 5.2 Online Algorithm in Arbitrary Dimension
693: 
694: :::{prf:theorem} Online Triangulation in d Dimensions
695: :label: thm-online-high-dim
696: 
697: The online triangulation algorithm generalizes to arbitrary dimension d:
698: 
699: **Per-Walker Update Complexity**:
700: 1. **SDE move (Type 1)**: O(d) Lawson flips on average
701: 2. **Cloning (Type 2)**: O(log N) point location + O(d) flips
702: 
703: **Per-Timestep Complexity**:
704: 
705: $$
706: T(N, d, p_{\text{clone}}) = O(N \cdot d) + O(p_{\text{clone}} \cdot N \cdot \log N)
707: 
708: $$
709: 
710: **For fixed dimension d**:
711: 
712: $$
713: \bar{T}(N, d) = O(N \cdot d) \quad \text{(amortized)}
714: 
715: $$
716: 
717: **Speedup vs. Batch**:
718: 
719: $$
720: \text{Speedup} = \frac{N^{\lceil d/2 \rceil}}{N \cdot d} = \frac{N^{\lceil d/2 \rceil - 1}}{d}
721: 
722: $$
723: 
724: **Example (d=4, N=10⁶)**:
725: - Batch: O(N²) ≈ 10¹² operations
726: - Online: O(N · 4) ≈ 4 × 10⁶ operations
